  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard(Player player, TowerColor towerColor, boolean isTowerHolder, PlayerConfig playerConfig)
      Creates a new Entrance, TowerSpace and DiningRoom. The maximum amount of students the entrance can hold and the maximum amount of students that can be moved from it every turn are decided based on the amount of players.
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the board
      towerColor - color of the player's towers

  • Method Details

    • getStudentByID

      public Student getStudentByID(int ID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Searches for a student in the entrance and dining room
      Parameters:
      ID - of the student to return
      Returns:
      student of specified ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no student with this ID is found

    • removeStudentByID

      public Student removeStudentByID(int studentID) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes a student from the player's board using its ID.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student to remove
      Returns:
      the removed student
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the student is not in the entrance, nor in the table of its color

    • addToEntrance

      public void addToEntrance(Student student)
      Method for adding a single student to the entrance.
      Parameters:
      student - the student to add to the entrance

    • addToDiningRoom

      public boolean addToDiningRoom(Student student) throws FullTableException
      Parameters:
      student - to add to the dining room (in the corresponding table)
      Throws:
      FullTableException - if the table of the same color is full

    • getEntranceStudentsIDs

      public HashMap<Integer,Color> getEntranceStudentsIDs()
      Method to observe all the students in the entrance and their color
      Returns:
      HashMap with the student ID as key and its color as object
